game.name: Shop Town Dooter
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A chaotic party top-down shooter. In arenas that throw different surprises every round, find a way to out-perform your friends, even if it means cheating, bribing, or bringing a MECH to a gunfight! Upgrade your guns mid-fights for maximum results. - no refunds in case of friendship destruction.
